name: Eggs Popper
description:
Eggs Popper is exciting and challenging game that will take you to the world of colorful balls. Once you download, you will be Enchanted by the wonderful dynamics of this amazing game, let's get started!

What we bring to you!
- With more than 100 challenging and exciting new levels
- Beautiful effects, fun sounds and super-realistic animals
- The game is free. You can play without wifi connection
- Shooter is suitable for all ages, very suitable for children when playing
